Description:
Exception is thrown out when input Data Expression and click OK.

Build number:
2.2.0.v20070427-1305

Steps to reproduce:
1. Drag a data item from Palette to Layout, input "new Date()" for Expression, 
   click OK.

Expected result:
No exception is thrown out.

Actual result:
Exception is thrown out.
